name: SupportKyleAndBaelBaby
_source: speak;Kyle;What in blazes...?|A Bael?|Here, in our camp?!
speak;Kyle;Hold on...|You're just a youngling, aren't you?|Prince Ephraim mentioned you before.|You must be {v:BaelBabyName}!
speak;Kyle;Easy there, little one.|Prince Ephraim spoke highly of you, but I must admit I'm still cautious.
speak;Kyle;You're injured!|That gash on your carapace...|Some brigand must have attacked you.
speak;Kyle;This needs tending to.|Hold still now.
speak;Kyle;There we go.|A knight's duty is to protect all innocent creatures.
speak;Kyle;You seem...different from other Baels I've encountered.|His Highness was right about you being special.
speak;Kyle;Well, you're patched up now.|The Prince said you were trustworthy, and I can see why.
speak;Kyle;What's that? You want to...follow me?|I suppose having a Bael companion would be quite unusual.
speak;Kyle;Ha!|Very well then.|I can tell why your name suits you well.|Come along, {v:BaelBabyName}.
speak;Kyle;{v:BaelBabyName}, what are you doing with my lance?
speak;Kyle;This is remarkable work.|Better than most squires could manage.
speak;Kyle;How in the world did you do that?
speak;Kyle;You've been watching me maintain my equipment, haven't you?|Learning by observation...
speak;Kyle;You know, when I was a young knight...|I had to learn everything through watching my senior knights.
speak;Kyle;Orson was particularly strict about equipment maintenance.|"A knight's weapon is his soul," he used to say.
speak;Kyle;I think he would approve of your work, {v:BaelBabyName}.|Especially with your...limitations.
speak;Kyle;You're quite intelligent for a Bael.|More so than some of the recruits I've trained, truth be told.
speak;Kyle;Thank you, {v:BaelBabyName}.|This means more to me than you know.
speak;Kyle;Perhaps...perhaps you'd like me to teach you more about knighthood?|Not the fighting, but the principles.
speak;Kyle;I'll take that as a yes.|Come, let me show you how to properly care for armor.
speak;Kyle;{v:BaelBabyName}! Get back!|That bandit has you cornered!
speak;Kyle;{v:BaelBabyName}, are you hurt?|That was far too close.
speak;Kyle;You...you were protecting that wounded villager, weren't you?|You put yourself in danger for a stranger.
speak;Kyle;That was the most knightly thing I've ever witnessed.|True chivalry knows no species.
speak;Kyle;You have the heart of a knight, {v:BaelBabyName}.|Honor, courage, selflessness...you embody them all.
speak;Kyle;Here, take this pendant.|This belonged to my mentor.|He gave it to me when I proved myself worthy.
speak;Kyle;Now I pass it to you.|You are more worthy than any knight I've known.
speak;Kyle;When this war ends, I want you to stay with me.|Not as a pet or companion, but as my partner.
speak;Kyle;We'll travel Grado together, helping those in need.|Sir Kyle and Dame {v:BaelBabyName}, knights errant.
speak;Kyle;You've taught me that nobility isn't about bloodline or title.|It's about the choices we make and the lives we protect.
speak;Kyle;Come, my friend.|We have a kingdom to save and people to protect.
